Description: Lower body sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery cup with trace of handle root; wholly glazed save an area below the handle; inscription cut on interior.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Edgar 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis. B: The Inscribed and Painted Pottery (no. 102b)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 704, no. 625b)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1582)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School at Athens
